### Checklist

- [ ] Ask yourself, what does this pull request do?
- [ ] Is the pull request doing what it should be doing, correctly?
- [ ] Is the code readable?
- [ ] Could the code be shorter?
- [ ] Could the code be smarter?
- [ ] Are changes covered by test?
- [ ] Is the code clean?
(tick if addressed)
